description: Temporary Help Services Requirement\This requirement is for: Department of National Defense (DND)\...
full_summary:
### **Solicitation Information**

* **Tender Title**: Special Advisor under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Solicitation Number**: S4515445
* **Publication Date**: June 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 10, 2023, at 12:00 PM EST
* **Current Status**: Expired

### **Goods and Services**

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued to qualified suppliers under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). The RFP covers a requirement for temporary help services from a Special Advisor. Suppliers must be registered under the Supply Arrangement number EN578-172870, with a qualification under the Special Advisor stream and category. 

The services required are High-Compliance Level/High-Risk. Specialized expertise is required to fulfill the needs of this requirement.

### **Security Clearance**

A minimum Top Secret clearance level is required to access and process the required information.

### **Eligible Suppliers**

Eligible suppliers have been identified, and only they are encouraged to submit a proposal.

### **Description and Scope**

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires a Special Advisor to support temporary help services. The aim is to achieve High-Compliance Level/High-Risk expertise and evaluate the security requirements for access to highly sensitive and classified data The selected advisor is expected to maintain expert abilities to fulfill critical support services

### **Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### **Contact Information**

For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

- Contact Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Hekp
- Contact Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
- Contact Phone Number: (613) 971-7955

### **Required Attachments**

To access the full RFP, please refer to the link below:

{https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6611/s4515445--method-2---rfp-%(english-version.pdf)}{https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6611/s
